long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Powered by Upgrader.Space

Getting a black loading screen? It's because you haven't replaced the default proxy in the options page. Free proxies are provided at https://Upgrader.Space/TwitchAdBlocker
For absolutely no additional cost- ever! Just copy & paste

Blocks all twitch ads 
- uses an improved ad blocking method
- uses standard HTTP proxies
- adds a stream status widget to the popup
- lets you use your own proxies (Optional)

**Notice** Does not remove banner ads, please pair with a normal adblocker for the best ad-free experience.
